zamaroney.github.io

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • zamaroney.github.io.Product
      • zamaroney.github.io.AudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, MultimediaControl

    public class AudioPlayer
extends Product
implements MultimediaControl
    Simulates the functionality of a audio player and adds audio description to a possible product.
